fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Education and training, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
The App Association has an interest in the activities in all European institutions – commission, parliament and council – and their impact on the EU-based, and global, small- and medium-sized entity (SME) innovator community and the digital economy. 
  
Interests include: 
    Artificial Intelligence 
    Digital Single Market Strategy 
    EU Communications Regulatory Framework 
    Cross-border Data Flows 
    Preventing Online Piracy & Cybercrime 
    eHealth 
    Data Protection 
    Data Security 
    Intellectual Property Rights 
    Internet of Things 
    Network Security & Interoperability 
    Taxation
organisation_name: ACT | The App Association (The App Association)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
European Internet Foundation (EIF) 
ICC - Chambre de Commerce Internationale 
ICANN GNSO Intellectual Prop Constituency 
ICANN GNSO Business Constituency 
ICAC Internet Education Foundation (IEF)
goals__remit: ACT | The App Association represents more than 5,000 app companies and information technology firms in the mobile economy. The organization advocates for an environment that inspires and rewards innovation while providing resources to help its members leverage their intellectual assets to raise capital, create jobs, and continue innovating.
relevant_communication:
- information sharing and dialogue, and publications on legislative developments affecting the SME innovator and technology sector and digital economy 
- involvement in European Commission projects 
- publication of App Association submissions to European Commission consultations on relevant initiatives
